#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--) {
		int f,h,w;
		cin >> f >> h >> w;

		ll min1 = 1000000000;
		int a[f+3];
		a[0]=0;
		for(int i=0;i<f;i++)
		{
			int val;
			cin >> val;
			a[i+1]=val;
		}
		a[f+1]=w;
		sort(a,a+f+2);
		int diff;
		for(int i=1;i<=f+1;i++)
		{
			diff = a[i]-a[i-1];
			//cout << diff << " " << min1 <<  endl;
			int k = diff*h;
			if(k < min1) min1 = k;
		}

		cout << min1 << endl;
	}	
	return 0;
}
